channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: 3 people shot at a Dallas ICE facility and the shooter is dead, official says
item.description: The director of U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement says three people have been shot at a Dallas ICE facility and the shooter is dead from a self-inflicted gunshot wound.

item.title: Black church leaders reject Charlie Kirk martyrdom and point to his race rhetoric
Kimmel returns to late night with an emotional monologue but no apologies following suspension
